name: Red41 The Silent Death
overview: The game demo is called Red 41 The Silent Death and has the protagonist of a robot very reminiscent of Appleseed (you know the cop with the antennas?); this game remembers, at least in the graphic style of the backgrounds and choice of colors. Occasionally you will even fly with the your robot. Some say the game is closer to Genocide 2 from the X68000. The Demo was released in The Games Machine Settembre Numero 56 in 1993.
